name: Human

racial_traits.name: Extra Feat
racial_traits.description: Humans gain one extra feat at 1st level.

racial_traits.name: Extra Skill Points
racial_traits.description: Humans gain 4 extra skill points at 1st level and 1 extra skill point at each additional level.

racial_traits.name: Favored Class
racial_traits.description: Any. When determining whether a multiclass human takes an experience point penalty, his or her highest-level class does not count.

description: Most human societies are a mix of good and evil, with a strong focus on law and order. They tend to be fairly balanced in all respects.

name: Dwarf

racial_traits.name: Darkvision
racial_traits.description: Dwarves can see in the dark up to 60 feet. Darkvision is black and white only, but it is otherwise like normal sight.

racial_traits.name: Weapon Familiarity
racial_traits.description: Dwarves may treat dwarven waraxes and dwarven urgroshes as martial weapons, rather than exotic weapons.

racial_traits.name: Stability
racial_traits.description: A dwarf gains a +4 bonus on ability checks made to resist being bull rushed or tripped when standing on the ground (but not when climbing, flying, riding, or otherwise not standing firmly on the ground).

racial_traits.name: Stonecunning
racial_traits.description: +2 racial bonus on Search checks to notice unusual stonework, such as sliding walls, stonework traps, new construction (even when built to match the old), unsafe stone surfaces, shaky stone ceilings, and the like. Something that isn't stone but that is disguised as stone also counts as unusual stonework. A dwarf who merely comes within 10 feet of unusual stonework can make a Search check as if he were actively searching, and a dwarf can use the Search skill to find stonework traps as a rogue can. A dwarf can also intuit depth, sensing his approximate depth underground as naturally as a human can sense which way is up.

racial_traits.name: Poison Resistance
racial_traits.description: +2 racial bonus on saving throws against poison.

racial_traits.name: Spell Resistance
racial_traits.description: +2 racial bonus on saving throws against spells and spell-like effects.

racial_traits.name: Combat Bonuses
racial_traits.description: +1 racial bonus on attack rolls against orcs and goblinoids. +4 dodge bonus to Armor Class against monsters of the giant type.

racial_traits.name: Skill Bonuses
racial_traits.description: +2 racial bonus on Appraise checks that are related to stone or metal items. +2 racial bonus on Craft checks that are related to stone or metal.

description: Dwarves are known for their skill in warfare, their ability to withstand physical and magical punishment, their knowledge of the earth's secrets, their hard work, and their capacity for drinking ale.

name: Elf

racial_traits.name: Low-Light Vision
racial_traits.description: An elf can see twice as far as a human in starlight, moonlight, torchlight, and similar conditions of poor illumination. She retains the ability to distinguish color and detail under these conditions.

racial_traits.name: Weapon Proficiency
racial_traits.description: Elves receive the Martial Weapon Proficiency feats for the longsword, rapier, longbow (including composite longbow), and shortbow (including composite shortbow) as bonus feats.

racial_traits.name: Keen Senses
racial_traits.description: +2 racial bonus on Listen, Search, and Spot checks. An elf who merely passes within 5 feet of a secret or concealed door is entitled to a Search check to notice it as if she were actively looking for it.

racial_traits.name: Immunity to Sleep
racial_traits.description: Immunity to magic sleep effects.

racial_traits.name: Enchantment Resistance
racial_traits.description: +2 racial saving throw bonus against enchantment spells or effects.

description: Elves are known for their poetry, song, and magical arts, but when danger threatens they show great skill with weapons and strategy.

name: Gnome

racial_traits.name: Small Size
racial_traits.description: +1 size bonus to Armor Class, +1 size bonus on attack rolls, +4 size bonus on Hide checks, -4 penalty on grapple checks, lifting and carrying limits 3/4 those of Medium characters.

racial_traits.name: Low-Light Vision
racial_traits.description: A gnome can see twice as far as a human in starlight, moonlight, torchlight, and similar conditions of poor illumination. He retains the ability to distinguish color and detail under these conditions.

racial_traits.name: Weapon Familiarity
racial_traits.description: Gnomes may treat gnome hooked hammers as martial weapons rather than exotic weapons.

racial_traits.name: Combat Bonuses
racial_traits.description: +1 racial bonus on attack rolls against kobolds and goblinoids. +4 dodge bonus to Armor Class against monsters of the giant type (such as ogres, trolls, and hill giants).

racial_traits.name: Spell-Like Abilities
racial_traits.description: 1/day—speak with animals (burrowing mammal only, duration 1 minute). A gnome with a Charisma score of at least 10 also has the following spell-like abilities: 1/day—dancing lights, ghost sound, prestidigitation. Caster level 1st; save DC 10 + gnome's Cha modifier + spell level.

racial_traits.name: Skill Bonuses
racial_traits.description: +2 racial bonus on Listen checks. +2 racial bonus on Craft (alchemy) checks.

description: Gnomes are welcome in most human lands, but they are most at home in hilly, forested areas.

name: Half-Elf

racial_traits.name: Low-Light Vision
racial_traits.description: A half-elf can see twice as far as a human in starlight, moonlight, torchlight, and similar conditions of poor illumination. She retains the ability to distinguish color and detail under these conditions.

racial_traits.name: Immunity to Sleep
racial_traits.description: Immunity to magic sleep effects.

racial_traits.name: Enchantment Resistance
racial_traits.description: +2 racial saving throw bonus against enchantment spells or effects.

racial_traits.name: Keen Senses
racial_traits.description: +1 racial bonus on Listen, Search, and Spot checks.

racial_traits.name: Elven Blood
racial_traits.description: For all effects related to race, a half-elf is considered an elf.

racial_traits.name: Extra Skill Points
racial_traits.description: +1 extra skill point at 1st level and +1 extra skill point whenever they gain a level.

racial_traits.name: Favored Class
racial_traits.description: Any. When determining whether a multiclass half-elf takes an experience point penalty, her highest-level class does not count.

description: Half-elves have no lands of their own, though they are welcome in human cities and somewhat less welcome in elven forests.

name: Half-Orc

racial_traits.name: Darkvision
racial_traits.description: Half-orcs can see in the dark up to 60 feet. Darkvision is black and white only, but it is otherwise like normal sight.

racial_traits.name: Orc Blood
racial_traits.description: For all effects related to race, a half-orc is considered an orc.

description: Half-orcs are the short-tempered and sullen result of human and orc pairings. They usually inherit the worst features of both parents.

name: Halfling

racial_traits.name: Small Size
racial_traits.description: +1 size bonus to Armor Class, +1 size bonus on attack rolls, +4 size bonus on Hide checks, -4 penalty on grapple checks, lifting and carrying limits 3/4 those of Medium characters.

racial_traits.name: Racial Bonuses
racial_traits.description: +2 racial bonus on Climb, Jump, and Move Silently checks.

racial_traits.name: Luck Bonus
racial_traits.description: +1 racial bonus on all saving throws.

racial_traits.name: Fear Resistance
racial_traits.description: +2 morale bonus on saving throws against fear. This bonus stacks with the halfling's +1 bonus on saving throws in general.

racial_traits.name: Weapon Proficiency
racial_traits.description: +1 racial bonus on attack rolls with thrown weapons and slings.

racial_traits.name: Keen Senses
racial_traits.description: +2 racial bonus on Listen checks.

description: Halflings are clever, capable opportunists. Halfling individuals and clans find room for themselves wherever they can.

name: Aasimar

racial_traits.name: Darkvision
racial_traits.description: Aasimar can see in the dark up to 60 feet. Darkvision is black and white only, but it is otherwise like normal sight.

racial_traits.name: Acid, Cold, and Electricity Resistance
racial_traits.description: Aasimar have resistance 5 against acid, cold, and electricity.

racial_traits.name: Spell-Like Ability
racial_traits.description: Daylight once per day as a sorcerer of a level equal to the aasimar's class levels.

racial_traits.name: Skill Bonuses
racial_traits.description: +2 racial bonus on Listen and Spot checks.

description: Aasimar are usually tall, good-looking, and generally pleasant. Some have a minor physical trait suggesting their heritage, such as silver hair, golden eyes, or an unnaturally intense stare.

name: Tiefling

racial_traits.name: Darkvision
racial_traits.description: Tieflings can see in the dark up to 60 feet. Darkvision is black and white only, but it is otherwise like normal sight.

racial_traits.name: Cold, Electricity, and Fire Resistance
racial_traits.description: Tieflings have resistance 5 against cold, electricity, and fire.

racial_traits.name: Spell-Like Ability
racial_traits.description: Darkness once per day as a sorcerer of a level equal to the tiefling's class levels.

racial_traits.name: Skill Bonuses
racial_traits.description: +2 racial bonus on Bluff and Hide checks.

description: Tieflings are sneaky, subtle, and generally conniving. They prefer to strike from ambush and usually avoid fair fights if they can.
